message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $150 for the product. Can we discuss further?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. How about $140?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $155? I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to save a bit more. How about $145?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $160? I'm willing to give you a good deal, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out
I'm still interested in the product, but $160 is getting too close to my budget. How about $150?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm getting a bit worried that we're running out of time. I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll meet you at $155, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options
